about_the_game:
Welcome to our 2D side-scrolling endless runner game, a thrilling and challenging adventure! In this fast-paced game, players control a character that continuously runs, jumps, and avoids obstacles, aiming to survive as long as possible to achieve a high score. Collecting underwear slows down the speed and increases health. The game is filled with meticulously designed obstacles and traps, testing players' reflexes and operational skills.

Game Features:

Easy to Learn: Smooth operation and simple controls make it easy for all players to get started.
Beautiful Graphics: 2D side-scrolling visuals, rich colors, and unique art style offer a visual delight.
Pleasant Music: The game includes enjoyable background music, allowing players to relax and enjoy themselves even during intense running.
Local High Score Record: Compete against your own career best to see who can run the farthest and score the highest.
Regular Updates: We will regularly add new levels and items to the game to keep it fresh and challenging.

content_descriptors.notes:
Our game contains mild sexual nudity, primarily presented in the menu interface. These instances involve partial nudity of characters but do not include explicit sexual acts.

Throughout the gameplay, players will not encounter themes such as sexual assault, non-consensual sex, substance abuse, or self-harm. Our goal is to provide an entertaining gaming experience while ensuring that the depiction of adult content adheres to appropriate ethical and legal standards.

In this fast-paced game, players control a character that continuously runs, jumps, and avoids obstacles, aiming to survive as long as possible to achieve a high score. name: Pantsu!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-6500
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Ryzen 7 1800X
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700K
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960M
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Experience the ultimate thrill of a 2D side-scrolling endless runner game, controlling your character to jump, dodge obstacles, challenge yourself for higher scores, and enjoy relaxing background music.
